Wander down this long private drive and find distinctive single-storey design with an easy-living, hard-working bonus! Poolside Living & a Parkside Panorama
INSPECTION BY APPOINTMENT - PLEASE CONTACT AGENT
A unique lifestyle opportunity in a panoramic parkside position, this sun-bathed property is one of only three homes with due-north direct-frontage to Dendy Park and arguably the one with the best parkland view.
Taking a unique outlook on the parklands with gracious formal living-dining and a pool-side family zone, this versatile five bedroom, three bathroom home shines with a light-filled skylit first-floor lounge and offers brilliant accommodation with a ground-floor suite plus a full-width master-domain with park-view study/retreat.
With scope for a fifth bedroom in a well-positioned home-office, and potential for independent living with a bonus wet-bar/kitchenette, this classic home comes prepared to adapt to family life with a quality appliance kitchen (with Bosch dishwasher) and elegant bathrooms (two with ensuite-access). Appointed for easy living with hydronic heating plus reverse-cycle air-conditioning, there are clever family comforts too; including a ducted vacuum system, hydronic drying-rack, and built-in robes plus roof-storage.
With a covered entertaining area beside the glass-fenced pool, and plentiful parking on a deep drive to the double garage, this panorama-view property has the ideal blend of garden privacy and seamless access to Baysides biggest and best-resourced backyard.
But its not just the direct access to the sports fields, running tracks, outdoor gym and playgrounds of Dendy Park that make his high-activity home such a lifestyle opportunity. With a local shopping strip at the end of the street, the station within a walk, and Haileybury and St Leonards Colleges, Kostka Hall and Brighton beach just down South Rd, this is the ultimate location for poolside parkside family life.

Remarkable Family Proportions with Parkland Views

Additional highlights include a separate lounge room, a powder room, generous under-house storage accessed via the pantry, plus ducted heating throughout, refrigerated cooling, secure video entry and the convenience of a lock-up garage that offers direct internal access to the main home as well a driveway parking with a highly convenient turntable.
Walk to shops, cafes, restaurants and bars all along Centre Rd, plus you have terrific local buses, trains nearby, plenty of parkland and GESAC only a few minutes away as well.
